system.notes: The Armour cobbled together during the opening of the Horus Heresy, still commonly used by Traitors. +10 Fellowship with Space Marines, but -10 with the Inquisition. +20 Strength. Subsystems: Autosenses (+5), Osmotic Sustainer, Pain Suppressant (6), Vox Link, Magnetised Boots, Nutrient Recycling (2 Weeks), Recoil Suppression. -10 Manual Dexterity Mod. Roll on Power Armour History 2 Times. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
